title: MD
biography: The Bidhan Chandra Roy Award is an award instituted in 1962 in memory of Bidhan Chandra Roy by the National Medical Commission. It is presented by the President of India in New Delhi every year on July 1, the National Doctors' Day. It is also the highest honour that can be achieved by a doctor in India.
aiSummary: Nikhil C. Munshi is a multiple myeloma genomics specialist with an H-index of 152 at Harvard University (Faculty). Has been published in Nature, The Lancet Oncology, New England Journal of Medicine. Based in United States.
